titleStmt.title: Beawtie dishonoured vvritten vnder the title of Shores wife Chascun se plaist ou il se trouue mieux.
titleStmt.author: Chute, Anthony, d. 1595?

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by [I. Windet for] Iohn Wolfe,
